overview: A young IT specialist Pasha is going to China for an important working meeting to put an end to failures in his career and life. Having almost died on the way, he miraculously remains alive, never knowing who saved him. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a strange mysterious place where there is not a single living soul, only boundless expanses and emptiness. Seeing a ghostly silhouette in the distance, he rushes in pursuit in the hope of finding out something, but again finds himself on the verge of death.
title: Kalachakra
